greeting.two: We are waiting for you in our exquisite {breakingLine} beauty salon
home.relax.title: Relaxing atmosphere
home.satisfaction.title: Customer satisfaction
home.services.title: Quality services
home.relax.text: At Wild Orchid you can forget about your every-day worries, relax and enjoy a procedure.
home.satisfaction.text: 90% of all our customers are regular clients who use the salon’s services at least once a month.
home.services.text: We take great pride in our work and we are ready to go the extra miles for our customers.
services.eyes.intro_one: We color eyebrows and lashes, and we offer both Lash Lift and lash extensions.
services.eyes.intro_two: With Lash Lift, we lift and shape your natural eyelashes so that they appear curved and larger. It opens the eyes up and the lashes work longer. The effect after treatment lasts for about four weeks.
services.eyes.intro_three: We use well-known and trusted brands, which combined with our professionalism give great results. The brands we use give us a wide range of shades that we can mix to match any skin type and hair color.
services.eyes.color_and_correction_brows: Coloring of lashes and brows, as well as correction of brows
services.eyes.lash_lift_and_color: Lash Lift incl. staining of lashes
services.eyes.lash_botox_addon_to_lift: Lash botox in conjunction with lash lift
services.spraytan.intro_one: For best results with our spray tan, peel the skin the day before (or in the morning on the day of treatment). It can either be done with a body scrub, glove or just a towel after the bath. It is important that you scrub your entire body.
services.spraytan.intro_two: The spray tan we use in our treatment consists of natural ingredients that not only make your skin glow, but also have a moisturizing effect that leads to soft and smooth skin. At Wild Orchid you get golden intense skin color with anti-aging effect.
services.spraytan.upper_body: Upper body incl. face, abdomen, back and arms
services.spraytan.whole_body_dark: The whole body incl. face (extra dark)
services.nails-intro_one: We have both strengthening nail treatments and various types of shellac treatments.
services.nails.intro_two: We use high quality products that do not contain harmful chemicals and that last a long time. Our treatments give a beautiful and lasting result for several weeks. We have countless colors to choose from and we can also make nail art such as drawings, patterns and glitter.
services.nails.luxus_manicure_shellac: Luxury spa manicure with shellac / la’rock
services.nails.shellac_fullcolor_fingers: Shellac / la’rock full color on fingers
services.nails.shellac_fullcolor_toes: Shellac / la’rock full color on toes
services.nails.shellac_fullcolor_fingers: Shellac / la’rock full color on fingers incl. filing of nails
services.nails.shellac_fullcolor_toes_fi: Shellac / la’rock full color on toes incl. filing of nails
services.nails.paraffin_treatment: Paraffin treatment for hands or feet
services.waxing.intro_one: At Wild Orchid, we remove hair with sugar paste and wax.
services.waxing.intro_two: We use high quality, EU-produced products in the wax and sugar treatment procedures. With these products, we make sure that hair does not break during the procedure, but is removed with a hair follicle. This means that skin looks smoother and hair grows more slowly.
services.waxing.intro_three: Over a longer period of hair removal, so much reduction in hair growth is achieved that the growth phase is stopped.
services.waxing.brows_lip: Wax of eyebrows and upper lip
services.waxing.face_parts: Wax of eyebrows / nose / upper lip / cheeks / chin / neck / sideburns
services.sugaring.enzyme_peeling: Enzyme peeling clinique care in connection with treatment
services.waxing.valid_for: *also applies to shaving or first time customer
